name: A Thief's Tale
description:
You are a small boy that has snuck into a mysterious monastery to collect a mysterious goblet. Now you need to escape.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Become big for a short while

Left-click: Swing a magic book while goblet is summoned

P - Restart level (if stuck)

Known bugs: - Graphical flickering in some places.

                       - Stealth UI not showing sometimes
